process.name: Add Property To Credentials
process.narrative: Adds property to existing credential and validates the data.

stage.name: Get Credentials
stage.narrative: Launchs BP, goes to System tab and gets the credentials table as collection.

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

resource.action: Credentials - Get List of Credentials As Collection

exception.detail: "Credential '" & [Credential Name] & "' already exists. It is necessary that the credential must not exist for this test."

input.name: Username
input.narrative: BP Username

input.name: Password
input.narrative: BP Password

input.name: Credential Name
input.narrative: Name of the Credential to be Created

input.name: Credential Username
input.narrative: Username to associated with new credential

input.name: Credential Password
input.narrative: Password to associated with new credential

input.name: Description
input.narrative: Description for the Credential

input.name: Expiry Date
input.narrative: Date of Expiry for the Credential

input.name: Invalid
input.narrative: False by default. True for invalid, False for valid

stage.name: Description
stage.initialvalue: A credential that is generated for testing purpose.

input.name: Username
input.narrative: BP Username

input.name: Password
input.narrative: BP Password

input.name: Credential Name
input.narrative: Name of the Credential to set the property

input.name: Property Name
input.narrative: Name of the Property

input.name: Property Value
input.narrative: Value of the Property

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: The name in which you want to call your encrpytion scheme.

input.name: Available?
input.narrative: This will tick a box that allows the encryption scheme to become available.

input.name: Database?
input.narrative: Mark as true if you want to store the scheme on the database. Please note that this will default to true.

input.name: Method
input.narrative: The encryption method used with the scheme.

input.name: Credential Name
input.narrative: Name of the Credential to open its Details window

resource.action: Credentials - Get Credential's Properties As Collection

input.name: Button to Press
input.narrative: Button to Press, Either OK or Cancel.

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

decision.expression: ExceptionDetail() = "Scheme '" & [Scheme Name] & "' already exists in Encryption Schemes."

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: The name of the scheme you wish to select.

resource.action: Encryption Schemes - Select Encryption Scheme for Credentials

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to
